clipboardHistory.value: kitty --class floating -e sh -c 'echo -e "\e[34m$(figlet -f ansi-shadow \"Uninstall\")\e[0m"; '"$INSTALLER_PATH"' uninstall; echo -e "\e[34m$(figlet -f ansi-shadow \"Done\")\e[0m"; echo "Uninstallation complete, press enter to continue"; read -r; exit 0'

"Ôíá List Explicitly Installed Packages"
    "Ôíá List Foreign (AUR) Installed Packages"

PACKAGES=$(pacman -Q)

use awk to map each package from "name verison" to "icon name | version"

icon is picked as follows:

if a package is in explicit_packages=$(pacman -Qen), icon=1

if a package is in aur_packages=$(pacman -Qm), icon=2

otherwise, icon = 3
if a package is in pacman -Qen, icon=1

#!/bin/bash HYPR_CONF="$HOME/.config/hypr/components/binds.conf" # extract the keybinding from hyprland.conf mapfile -t BINDINGS < <(grep '^bind=' "$HYPR_CONF" | \ sed -e 's/ */ /g' -e 's/bind=//g' -e 's/, /,/g' -e 's/ # /,/' | \ awk -F, -v q="'" '{cmd=""; for(i=3;i"$1 " + " $2 " " $NF "," cmd ""}') CHOICE=$(printf '%s\n' "${BINDINGS[@]}" | rofi -dmenu -i -markup-rows -p "Hyprland Keybinds:") # extract cmd from span cmd CMD=$(echo "$CHOICE" | sed -n 's/.*\(.*\)<\/span>.*/\1/p') # execute it if first word is exec else use hyprctl dispatch if [[ $CMD == exec* ]]; then eval "$CMD" else hyprctl dispatch "$CMD" fi
kitty --class floating -e sh -c 'echo -e "\e[34m$(figlet -f ansi-shadow \"Clean\")\e[0m"; sudo pacman -Rns $(pacman -Qdtq); echo "Cleaning complete, press enter to continue"; read -r; exit 0'
kitty --class floating -e sh -c 'echo -e "\e[34m$(figlet -f ansi-shadow \"Clean\")\e[0m"; sudo pacman -Rns $(pacman -Qdtq); echo "Cleaning complete, press enter to continue"; read -r; exit 0'

killall rofi
            sleep 0.05
            kitty --class floating -e sh -c 'echo -e "\e[34m$(figlet -f ansi-shadow \"Uninstall\")\e[0m"; '"$INSTALLER_PATH"' uninstall; echo "Uninstallation complete, press enter to continue"; read -r; exit 0'
            ;;

kitty --class floating -e sh -c 'echo -e "\e[34m$(figlet -f ansi-shadow \"Install AUR\")\e[0m"; '"$INSTALLER_PATH"' install aur; echo "Installation complete, press enter to continue"; read -r; exit 0'
kitty --class floating -e sh -c 'echo -e "\e[34m$(figlet -f ansi-shadow \"Uninstall\")\e[0m"; '"$INSTALLER_PATH"' uninstall; echo "Uninstallation complete, press enter to continue"; read -r; exit 0'
kitty --class floating -e sh -c "echo -e "\e[34m$(figlet -f ansi-shadow "Uninstall")\e[0m"; $INSTALLER_PATH uninstall; echo "Uninstallation complete, press enter to continue"; read -r; exit 0"
read -r -p "3. Updating grub? (y/N - Press Enter for Yes): " confirm_grub

#!/bin/sh

echo "Starting System Update Sequence..."
echo "-----------------------------------"

# 1. Update all packages using yay
echo "1. Updating all packages using yay..."
yay --noconfirm

# 2. Update mkinitcpio (Kernel Initial RAM Disk)
echo ""
read -r -p "2. Run 'sudo mkinitcpio -P' to rebuild the kernel images? (y/N - Press Enter for Yes): " confirm_mkinitcpio

# Check user confirmation: Empty input (Enter) or input starting with 'y' or 'Y' runs the command.
case "$confirm_mkinitcpio" in
    "" | [Yy]* )
        echo "Running mkinitcpio..."
        sudo mkinitcpio -P
        ;;
    * )
        echo "Skipping mkinitcpio update."
        ;;
esac

# 3. Update Grub bootloader configuration
echo ""
read -r -p "3. Run 'sudo grub-mkconfig' to update the bootloader config? (y/N - Press Enter for Yes): " confirm_grub

# Check user confirmation: Empty input (Enter) or input starting with 'y' or 'Y' runs the command.
case "$confirm_grub" in
    "" | [Yy]* )
        echo "Running grub-mkconfig..."
        sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg
        ;;
    * )
        echo "Skipping grub configuration update."
        ;;
esac

echo "-----------------------------------"
echo "System update sequence complete."

#!/bin/sh

echo "Starting System Update Sequence..."
echo "-----------------------------------"

# 1. Update all packages using yay
echo "1. Updating all packages using yay..."
yay --noconfirm

# 2. Update mkinitcpio (Kernel Initial RAM Disk)
echo ""
read -r -p "2. Run 'sudo mkinitcpio -P' to rebuild the kernel images? (Press Enter for Yes, type anything else to skip): " confirm_mkinitcpio

# Check if the input is empty (meaning the user pressed Enter)
if [ -z "$confirm_mkinitcpio" ]; then
    echo "Running mkinitcpio..."
    sudo mkinitcpio -P
else
    echo "Skipping mkinitcpio update."
fi

# 3. Update Grub bootloader configuration
echo ""
read -r -p "3. Run 'sudo grub-mkconfig' to update the bootloader config? (Press Enter for Yes, type anything else to skip): " confirm_grub

# Check if the input is empty (meaning the user pressed Enter)
if [ -z "$confirm_grub" ]; then
    echo "Running grub-mkconfig..."
    sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg
else
    echo "Skipping grub configuration update."
fi

#!/bin/sh

# update packages
yay
# update mkinitcpio
sudo mkinitcpio -P
# update grub
sudo grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg
echo "Installation complete, press enter to continue"; read -r; exit 0

echo "Installation complete, press enter to continue"

read -r

exit 0
echo "Installation complete, press enter to continue"

killall rofi
            sleep 0.05
            kitty --class floating -e sh -c $INSTALLER_PATH install aur
            ;;
